title: Weekly Team Games Night
description:
# Team Games Night

Join us every Friday for casual team games! All skill levels welcome.

## What to Expect
- 2v2 and 3v3 matches
- Friendly competition
- Coaching tips throughout
- Discord voice chat

## Requirements
- Discord account
- Starcraft 2 (any version)
- Positive attitude!

title: Bronze-Gold Tournament
description:
# November Bronze-Gold Tournament

Compete against players at your skill level for prizes and glory!

## Tournament Details
- **Format**: Best of 3, single elimination
- **Map Pool**: Current ladder maps
- **Check-in**: 30 minutes before start
- **Prize Pool**: $100

## Rules
- Must be Bronze-Gold league
- No smurfing (will be verified)
- Standard ladder rules apply

## Registration
Register in our Discord #tournaments channel before the event!

title: Terran Build Order Workshop
description:
# Terran Build Order Deep Dive

Master the fundamentals of Terran macro with our expert coach.

## Workshop Focus
- 1-1-1 builds
- 3CC timing attacks
- Defensive play
- Build order execution

## What You'll Learn
- Supply timings
- Worker counts
- Transition points
- Common mistakes to avoid

## Format
- 1 hour lecture
- 30 min Q&A
- Replay review

Perfect for Platinum and below players looking to improve their macro!
